actions.text: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Hill (AR).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hill (AR) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to increase and decrease funding in the Small Business Administration's Entrepreneurial Development Programs by $5,000,000 to support funding for the Small Business Administration's Regional Innovation Cluster Program.
purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to increase and decrease funding in the Small Business Administration's Entrepreneurial Development Programs by $5,000,000 to support funding for the Small Business Administration's Regional Innovation Cluster Program.
